summary: Jerry Stafford, a businessman, is in love with his secretary but she deserts him for another man. When she realizes her mistake, she goes back to him. Doris Brown is her girlfriend who is in love with a man named Monty Dunn.
cast: Claudette Colbert|Fredric March|Monroe Owsley|Charles Ruggles|Ginger Rogers|Avonne Taylor|Pat O'Brien|Janet McLeary|John Kearney|Ralph Morgan|Jules Epailly|Leonard Carey|Grace Kern|Winifred Harris|Roberta Beatty|Charles Halton|Granville Bates|Si Wills|Betty Morrissey|Nathan Rozofsky|Robert Barrat|Elisha Cook Jr.|Charles Trowbridge
title: Honor entre amantes
